gameMaster.name: Alex Johnson
gameMaster.description: Alex leads our events with unmatched energy and creativity, ensuring every participant has a thrilling experience.

hosts.name: Sarah Lee
hosts.description: Keeps everything running smoothly and ensures participants are always in the loop.
hosts.quote: Organization is the key to a great event.

hosts.name: Michael Chen
hosts.description: Handles all the technical setups and ensures the event runs without glitches.
hosts.quote: Tech is the backbone of seamless experiences.

hosts.name: Priya Kumar
hosts.description: Designs the visuals and layouts that make the event engaging and visually appealing.

hosts.name: David Smith
hosts.description: Manages all the on-ground logistics to keep things running perfectly.
hosts.quote: A well-planned event is a successful event.
